mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id comment_id, c.comment_content comment_content, c.comment_userid comment_userid, u.user_name comment_username,c.comment_movieid comment_movieid,m.movie_name comment_moviename, c.comment_score comment_score,c.comment_time comment_time FROM comment c left join user u on c.comment_userid = u.user_id left join movie m on m.movie_id = c.comment_movieid WHERE c.comment_movieid = #{movieId}

SELECT * FROM comment where 1=1
AND comment_content LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%')
